selection.select: Add row with ID '{id}' to the selection.
selection.deselect: Remove row with ID '{id}' from the selection.

action.asc: Sort the table ascending by the {field} column.
action.desc: Sort the table descending by the {field} column.

tooShort.fullError: Make the input at least {minLength} characters long. It is currently {n} characters long. Special characters might use more than one character.

tooLong.fullError: Shorten the input to {maxLength} characters or less. It is currently {n} characters long. Special characters might use more than one character.

rangeUnderflow.fullError: Input value must be greater than or equal to {min}.

rangeOverflow.fullError: Input value must be less than or equal to {max}.

valueMissing.fullError: The field is empty, it is mandatory and must be filled in.

stepMismatch.fullError: Please enter a valid number, that is a multiple of {step}.

badInput.fullError: "{value}" does not match the expected type.

generic.fullError: "{value}" does not match the expected type.

email.fullError: "{value}" is not a valid email address. It should be similar to "johndoe{'@'}example.com" (Must contain one {'@'} symbol and a period).

number.fullError: "{value}" is not a valid number. Make sure it contains only digits, and optionally a single decimal point.

tel.fullError: "{value}" is not a valid phone number.

url.fullError: "{value}" is not a valid URL. A URL usually points to a website and should be similar to "https://www.example.com".

navigation.moreActionsFlyout: Choose an action for the column "{column}"

colorScheme.headline: Change appearance
colorScheme.subtitle: Select the appearance of the application:

auto.label: Auto
auto.description: The application automatically adapts its appearance to your system settings.

light.label: Light
light.description: Light mode provides optimal contrast for bright environments.

dark.label: Dark
dark.description: This color mode is optimized for darker environments.

languageSelect.label: Language
languageSelect.headline: Change language
languageSelect.subtitle: Select the language of the application:

fileUpload.maxFileCount: Maximum {n} files to select in total

status.fileSizeError: File exceeds maximum allowed size of {size}
status.maxFileSizeError: Total size of all files exceeds maximum allowed of {size}
status.maxCountError: Number of files exceeds maximum allowed of {count}
